segments.text: I take a moment to observe the little girl, her hand raised, waiting for her cookie like a puppy waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her innocence makes me smile, but I can’t help but feel a knot of worry in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s standing there, completely unaware of the danger of the stool behind her, is unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she would still be so eager if she knew her brother was risking everything for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me feels happy that they have such a close bond, but then there's that lurking sense of impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those simple moments filled with laughter and cookies can turn into chaos so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't shake the feeling that this tender scene might end with a loud crash.
segments.speaker: PAR
